title: 505: Seven Harry Potter Fan Films That Expand The Story in Brilliant Ways
itunes:title: Seven Harry Potter Fan Films That Expand The Story in Brilliant Ways
description:
• The MuggleCasters recently appeared on Evanna Lynchâ€™s ChickPeeps podcast, where we nerded out on Harry Potter - check it out!
  • We remember Harry Potter fandom icon Nigel Taylor (Vladimir Snape)
  • Grab the popcorn, candy and soda and hide it inside Laura's huge purse, because this week, we're going to the movies!
  • In our main discussion this week, we review several excellent Harry Potter Fan-Made Short Films
  • We review some of the best fan-made movies over the last several years
  • Severus Snape the The Marauders
  • Voldemort: Origins of the Heir
  • Lily Evans and the Eleventh Hour
  • Life After Fred
  • Dumbledore and Grindelwald: For The Greater Good
  • Harrey Podder: Say The Magic Word
  • Sisters of House of Black
  • The hosts give their own ideas for a Harry Potter short film
  • Quizzitch: At what United States college was A Very Potter Musical written and first performed? Visit MuggleCast.com/Quizzitch to submit your answer!
  • This week's episode is sponsored by MD Acne (Take the quiz and get your first month supply for free, just pay shipping).
  • Support us on Patreon and receive magical benefits, like a personalized thank you video from one of the hosts and Bonus MuggleCast!
